title: Horror Hotel
description:
Hotels are notoriously haunted locations. So it's no wonder that it’s the chosen setting for many movies and urban legends.  Every single day, people come and go through the lobby - and some never truly leave. In this week’s episode, we’ll be exploring some hotels with guests who have overstayed their welcome. First, Sapphire shares a story about a teenage girl who gets into an elevator at the wrong time. Then, we’ll explore the haunted Ripley Castle. And finally, join the night shift at The Good Shade Hotel.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
